titleStmt.title: Letter: 1878 A few thoughts and facts concerning the “Sabbath” and its due observance. Hawke’s Bay Herald 24, 27, 28 September; 1, 5, 22, 31 October; 14, 15, 21, 29 November; 4, 12 December.

front.p: 1878 A few thoughts and facts concerning the “Sabbath” and its due observance.lb/> Hawke’s Bay Herald 24, 27, 28 September; 1, 5, 22, 31 October; 14, 15, 21, 29 November; 4, 12 December. These letters were collected and published as a booklet: “Tracts for the times No. 1: On the Sabbath and its due observance” republished in Vol. 3 of this series: What I believe to be genuine and authentic—Ed.
